Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-positive bacteria
Literature.Author: Guzmán F, Marshall S, Ojeda C, Albericio F, Carvajal-Rondanelli P

Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-negative bacteria
Literature.Author: Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Aróstica M, Marshall SH, Albericio F, Álvarez CA, Ojeda C, Aguilar LF, Guzmán F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(60-70% Inhibition=10µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(60-70% Inhibition=10µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(60-70% Inhibition=10µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(90-100% Inhibition=10-30µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(30-40% Inhibition=10µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(40-50% Inhibition=20µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(60-70% Inhibition=30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(50-60% Inhibition=20µM)
